products.title: Hive Lusso Steel Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Hive Lusso Steel Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX80205. A luxurious dim-out blind, produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric.
products.productdescription: Hive Lusso Steel Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive privacy non-Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The Hive Lusso range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.

products.title: Hive Matrix Blackout Silver Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Hive Matrix Blackout Silver Pleated Skylight Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £57.74 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Hive Blackout Matrix is a textured honey-combed pleated fabric.  Due to it's comb-structure, the guide wires are hidden within the blind, adding a cleaner finish to this lovely fabric.
 
 Product ID: DB-PLS0114 Fabric Colour: Silver Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
